Regulation Name(s): Culture Medium for Antimicrobial Susceptibility Tests
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Chromogenic selective and differential culture medium
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BBL CHROMagar MRSA II selective chromogenic medium for direct detection of MRSA nasal colonization from nares swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative direct detection of nasal colonization by MRSA using anterior nares swab specimens to aid prevention and control of MRSA infections in healthcare settings
